context: Analyze this arm balance pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Crow Pose (Bakasana) Arm balance with knees on upper arms. Consider the Upper body strength, core strength, fear transformation. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Arm balance with knees on upper arms
practitioner.primaryFocus: Upper body strength, core strength, fear transformation
